detail_desc: Shell and metal bracelet with a fabric cord that can also be worn as an anklet. Adjustable length 18-24 cm.

Checked Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short dress in lace made from a cotton blend with a deep V-neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication around the shoulders and concealed elastication and a frill trim at the hems. Seam at the waist with a small frill trim, and a flared skirt with a wide, scallop-edged flounce at the hem. Lined.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in stretch cotton twill with pleats at the top, a fake wrapover at the front, side pockets, and a visible zip and tie at the side. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation leather. Adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Fabric-covered hair elastics with a bow.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. One pair with a print motif on the fingertips.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Straight-cut dress in a soft weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Imitation suede ballet pumps with one open side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Straight-cut coat in soft imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, patch front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No fasteners.

Coat in imitation leather with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, welt side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined. The coat is PETA Approved Vegan-certified and meets PETA’s requirements for vegan products. This certification guarantees that the product is entirely free from materials and substances of animal origin. The polyurethane content of the coat is water-based and free from DMF.
Jacket in soft pile with an embroidered motif at the top, jersey-lined hood and zip down the front. Front pockets with an embroidered motif, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Small umbrella with a telescopic handle and a fabric wrist strap. Size 7x15.5 cm folded.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front and a strap over the foot. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Vest top in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the top.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with a round neck and short sleeves.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Maxi dress with a round neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short cap sleeves. Double layer at the top with a lace top layer and a lined, pleated chiffon skirt.
Fitted jumper in a soft, airy, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Small stand-up collar and long sleeves.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam with a wide flounce a the hem.
Short shorts in a cotton weave with embroidery, an elasticated waist and scalloped broderie anglaise trims at the hems.
Lace blouse with a small stand-up collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in jacquard-patterned jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in airy, sequined chiffon with a V-neck and shoulder straps that cross at the back. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top, a seam under the bust with an inset section, and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

prod_name: SB Samuel water repelle jkt TP
detail_desc: Padded jacket in a water-repellent weave with a padded, detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Reflective details. Partly lined in fleece. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a print on the legs, wide elastication at the waist and concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Metal hoop earrings. Diameter approx. 2.4 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Fitted rib-knit jumper in a soft alpaca blend with a deep neckline at the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, straight T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif, short raglan sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Moulded plastic fancy dress mask with lace on the front and an elastic strap at the back.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles.
Non-padded bras in lace with underwired, mesh-lined cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Metal hairclips with flower-shaped appliqués in tulle and sparkly stones. Length 5 cm.
Pyjama shorts in soft patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist,a fake fly and side pockets.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned weave with a high waist, concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Nylon hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles that are made partly from recycled polyester. Rubber soles.
Short, straight-cut dress in satin with a boat neck, long, wide sleeves and wide cuffs with round metal buttons. Unlined.
Non-wired lace bustier with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a seam under the bust.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Opening with press-studs at one side and press-studs at the crotch.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a cotton weave with one narrow and one wide shoulder strap. Draped front, a concealed zip in one side and an asymmetric hem.
Top in soft, lightly crêped jersey with a V-neck opening at the top and a vertical seam down the front.
Hoodie in soft, fine-knit cotton with a text motif. Wrapover hood, long sleeves and a longer layer in a contrasting colour at the hem with short slits in the sides.
Cargo trousers in sturdy, patterned cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, drawstring hood, zip down the front, two-part kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in a patterned weave with lace details, a V-neck and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back. Lined.

Super push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and silicon trim at the back to hold the bra in place. Wide fastening at the back with hooks and eyes.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles, and rubber soles. Heel 4 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with lace panels down the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers with reinforced toes, a padded edge and closed lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Off-the-shoulder top in a patterned cotton weave with a flounce at the top, short, wide sleeves and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Hi-top trainers in leather and suede with a soft shaft with narrow elastication at the top, lacing, and a loop at the front and back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky, fluted rubber soles.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy washed denim with hard-worn details, patches on the legs and a zip fly and button.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset and wide sides. Seamless.
Long top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover front. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back and ties at the front.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges and long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs.
Straight-cut yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Cut out section on one shoulder and at the back.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, an elastic drawstring at the top of the shaft and reflective details. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. The boots have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Slim-fit trousers in washed cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.
Short, wide dress in a rustle weave with short cap sleeves, side pockets and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Printed jersey top with 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
